basic.Peptide Name: LFB-RI (derivative of bovine lactoferrin with residues substitution)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=5.63 µM), Escherichia coli (wild strain) (MIC=3.75 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=11.25 µM), Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC=15 µM).
